name: Claw Machine Sim
description:
Features

  • Fully simulated physics!
  • Choose between the FUN or REALISTIC difficulty.
  • Endless fun! Refill the machine after winning a set amount of prizes
  • Collect and inspect 200 prizes! All fully 3D!
  • Various accessiblity options

Special Prizes

Special Prizes randomly appear. You have 3 attempts to win them, before they disappear again.

Customize

Customize your arcade by importing your own image! All aspect ratios are supported. Simply drag and drop a .png or .jpg file into the game.
